Intel.​IntelCluster

Intel about cluster with spotted enemies

Variables
efficiency

Efficiency vector, only useful for commander

dateNumberLastSpotted

(dateToNumber date) when any unit from this cluster was seen last time

pos1

Bottom-left pos of the cluster

pos2

Top-right pos of the cluster

Functions
clientUpdate

Gets called on client when this intel item is updated. It should update data in UI, map, other systems.  !! You don't need to copy member variables here manually !! They will be copied automatically by database methods.  Just update necessary data of map markers and other things if you need.

Parameters: _intelSrc

_intelSrc

the the Intel item where values will be copied from

Returns: nil

clientRemove

Gets called on client before this intel item is deleted.  It should unregister itself from UI, map, other systems.

Returns: nil
